description: Mumbai, formerly known as Bombay, has suffered several major terror attacks in recent years.
title: Past Attacks in India
title_page: Past Attacks in India - The New York Times
text:
India has been hit by a succession of terror attacks in recent years. Left, police prepared to take position at the site of attack in the Colaba area of Mumbai on Nov. 27, 2008.
Indranil Mukherjee/Agence France-Presse -- Getty Images
